name: Atomic Fighter Bomber
description:
Fight a continuous wave of enemy vehicles including APC's, tanks, anti-aircraft, missile launchers, helicopter gunships and fighter jets!
Annihilate the invaders and trump their offensive with canon fire, bombs, rocket attacks, heat seeking missiles or be an atomic bomber with the MOAB nuke!
Featuring realistic bomb physics, air force dogfights, weapon upgrades, 4 different aircraft, epic explosions, nuclear blasts and much, much more.
Compete with pilots worldwide and see if you are good enough to climb the ranks to world no.1.
Is this WW3? Do your patriotic duty and defend your land, happy bombing!
